        As a reward for winning the battle, I want this person to be my wife...'' If the engagement is broken off, she will fall in love with the one-eyed Count!?The day before the ball, Belladonna regains her memories from before her reincarnation. At the ball, she was told that her engagement would be broken off and she would be condemned. Just as she remembers from her previous life, Belladonna is accused of bullying the heroine, and her engagement is called off. She is so upset that she pours wine on Barone, a one-eyed count who swears allegiance to the royal family. When she gave up thinking that she had no choice but to be condemned as it was, she... ``My beloved Belladonna...'' That wine contains the ``love potion'' that Belladonna desperately obtained in order to change her fate - ...!!+
